attributes.review: okay so i was downloading this app to see what our president was doing for this upcoming election but it turns out he is actually a terrible person? Donald trump is disgusting and so is this app. they tried to hack me by asking for my number and tried to text me. then i was so scared by the photo of him that i just had to delete the app. HORRIBLE. Biden 2020
attributes.title: i hate this app

attributes.review: I bought the app trying to find out REAL news for once but before you can do anything you have to put in your phone number 😔 very private info I can’t believe they would even ask. And for what?? To sell my info to the highest bidder in Russia???? No thank you 😔😔
attributes.title: Definitely selling your phone number 😔😔

attributes.review: I personally think this is a horrible app sure I’m mostly saying this because the Trump administration is trying to take down TickTock a very big app right now and I use TikTok myself but in general texting Trump who would want to do that no offense to the president I think he is all right but I would not want to text to the president
attributes.title: Save TickTock

attributes.review:
This app constantly closes itself and freezes up on me. Such a shame because I was so excited to use it.

Trump, hope you fix this soon. Maybe for now we should just all you other apps, y know, like video sharing platforms that this country actually enjoys. Just saying.
attributes.title: Extremely bugged.

attributes.review: This app is totally unbelievable🙄 After it took 97 hours to download I opened it and got my finger slammed in the fridge door by my cat😿 Later that day I was just looking up something on it for info on the election and my hamster pushed me into a tub of boiling nail polish. I’m still stained🤒 possibly the worst app I’ve ever downloaded and If I could give it zero stars I would😽
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: I was really exited to get this app and just support our wonderful 💄Cheeto🥳but then a lot of weird things started happening I started noticing that my mom was buying more and more Cheetos from winco and it was kinda sus 👀than Elsa started popping up✨but I wasn’t mad😌anyway I decided to get hot Cheetos instead I am a trump supporter but this just wasn’t it
attributes.title: I was disappointed 😔😤

attributes.review: Downloaded this app to get quick and reliable news about the Trump 2020 campaign. This app crashed my phone repeatedly and made it run incredible slow. Once I got the app to run, I realized the information on this app is linked to white supremacy!!!! It is dangerous and should not be accessible to anyone.
attributes.title: Terrible Experience and Content

attributes.review: I was so excited for this app, I wanted to be able to be kept in the loop for this next election, it’s coming up so fast!! But the app just won’t work. It glitches all the time and exits me out before I can even see it. I’m not even able to make an account on it before it kicks me out. Needs fixed
attributes.title: Was so excited

attributes.review: I got this app because I was promised a free Hot Wheels Criss Cross Crash Crack Set. I’m a huge Hawt Wheelz fan and needed this to complete the set. When I downloaded the app it told me to put in my address and said that it sent my package. I was so excited when the package arrived. I opened it up just to find out it’s a 8 foot tall cardboard cut out of Harry styles. I am never voting for trump or trusting this app.

App kept constantly crashing and glitching while trying to use. I even had to turn my whole phone off and back on again several time to get it to work again. Would not recommend to even the biggest supporters
attributes.title: Too many bugs
